publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-375 Christine Grahame: Recruitment Policy for Children's Panelsâ€”That the Parliament is concerned that the current recruitment policy for children's panel members currently requires refusal of applications from those in the 60 and over age group and calls on the Scottish Executive to review this policy.
S2M-375 Recruitment Policy for Children's Panels (lodged on 22 September 2003) Mr Adam Ingram*, Alex Neil*, Ms Sandra White*
S2M-375 Recruitment Policy for Children's Panels (lodged on 22 September 2003) Donald Gorrie*

S2M-375 Christine Grahame: Recruitment Policy for Children's Panels-That the Parliament is concerned that the current recruitment policy for children's panel members currently requires refusal of applications from those in the 60 and over age group and calls on the Scottish Executive to review this policy. Supported by: Mr Adam Ingram, Alex Neil, Ms Sandra White, Donald Gorrie
S2M-375 Recruitment Policy for Children's Panels (lodged on 22 September 2003) Michael Matheson*
S2M-375 Recruitment Policy for Children's Panels (lodged on 22 September 2003) Fiona Hyslop*
S2M-375 Recruitment Policy for Children's Panels (lodged on 22 September 2003) Brian Adam*
S2M-375 Recruitment Policy for Children's Panels (lodged on 22 September 2003) Mr Stewart Maxwell*
